title: Skin Giveaway every 3 wins in a row

embed.description: Skin Giveaway every 3 wins in a row!

body: It is as good as it sounds, just trying to do some marketing to gain some brand awareness. All you have to do is be active in chat at the time of the giveaway.

replies.body: Almost to Diamond. Streaming again tonight and most the day tomorrow.
Congrats to ManThatCosplays! Hope you enjoy the new Nasus skin! Thanks for watching.
Congrats to Pmoco on the skin win. 6 wins in a row feels good
Back at it again today! Hit Plat 3 yesterday. Plat 2 here I come.
Congrats to Mrgummy111 for winning the first skin of the day!
Currently at 2 wins in a row. If I win next one, we got a giveaway.
